      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Creates a company in the system.

      Creates a customer in the system.

      Returns all coupons that are registered in the system, under a specified company, by Id.

      Returns all customers that are registered in the system.
      List<Coupon> CouponDAO.getAllPurchacedCouponByDate(long customerId, Date date)
      Returns all coupons that are registered in the system, under a specified customer, by Id, which are of specified date or earlier.
      List<Coupon> CouponDAO.getAllpurchasedCouponByPrice(long customerId, double price)
      Returns all coupons that are registered in the system, under a specified customer, by Id, which are of specified price.
      List<Coupon> CouponDAO.getAllpurchasedCouponByType(long customerId, CouponType type)
      Returns all coupons that are registered in the system, under a specified customer, by Id, which are of specified type.

      Returns all coupons that are registered in the system, under a specified customer, by Id.
      Company CompanyDAO.getCompany(long id)
      Returns a company by ID.
      Company CompanyDAO.getCompanyByName(String name)
      Returns a company by name.
      Coupon CouponDAO.getCoupon(long id)
      Returns a coupon by ID.
      Coupon CouponDAO.getCouponByTitle(String title)
      Returns a coupon by name.
      List<Coupon> CouponDAO.getCouponsCompanyByDate(long id, Date date)
      Returns all coupons that are registered in the system, under a specified company, by Id, and which are of specified date or earlier.
      List<Coupon> CouponDAO.getCouponsCompanyByPrice(long companyId, double price)
      Returns all coupons that are registered in the system, under a specified company, by Id, and which are of specified price or lower.
      List<Coupon> CouponDAO.getCouponsCompanyByType(long CompanyId, CouponType type)
      Returns all coupons that are registered in the system, under a specified company, by Id and which are of specified type.

      Returns a customer by ID.

      Returns a customer by name.

      Checks whether a company with the specified name exists.

      Checks whether the customer has already purchased the specified coupon.

      Checks whether a coupon with specified title exists.

      Checks whether a customer with the specified name and password exists.

      Checks whether a company with the specified name and password exists.
